mapper.select:
SELECT FROM cdpma_good
AND good_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{goodName}, '%')
AND is_disabled = #{isDisabled}
ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cdpma_good (good_name, category_id, created_by, created_at, updated_by, updated_at, is_disabled, price, like_num) VALUES (#{goodName}, #{categoryId}, #{createdBy}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedAt}, #{isDisabled}, #{price}, #{likeNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE cdpma_good SET good_name = #{goodName}, category_id = #{categoryId}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, is_disabled = #{isDisabled}, price = #{price} WHERE good_id = #{goodId}
